title: 3M executives convinced a scientist forever chemicals in human blood were safe
dot: digraph PFOS_Controversy{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, color="#45b39d", fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];ProPublica[label="ProPublica: Investigates abuses of power"];Hansen[label="Kris Hansen: Chemist at 3M"];Johnson[label="Jim Johnson: Senior Scientist at 3M (Hansen's Boss)"];Bacon[label="Dale Bacon: Johnson's Superior"];DeSimone[label="Livio D. DeSimone: 3M CEO"];PFOS_Research[label="Hansen's PFOS Research: Found PFOS in general population's blood"];PFOS_Internal_Research[label="3M's Early Internal Research: Found PFOS to be toxic in animals (1970s)"];EPA_Notification[label="3M Notified EPA: PFOS in blood, no adverse effects (1998-1999)"];PFOS_Phaseout[label="3M Decided to Phase Out PFOS (2000)"];PFOS_Secret[label="3M Kept PFOS Toxicity Secret: Even to internal scientists"];PFAS_Settlement[label="3M Settles PFAS Lawsuit: Pays $12.5 billion (2022)"];PFAS_Environmental_Impact[label="PFAS Pollution: Widespread contamination, ongoing health risks"];Hansen_Volunteer[label="Hansen Volunteers: Works to protect local nature preserve"];PFAS_Regulation[label="EPA Regulation: No safe level of PFOS/PFOA (2023)"];Public_Awareness[label="Public Awareness: PFAS linked to various health issues"];ProPublica->PFOS_Research[label="<Hansen receives assignment to test blood>"];PFOS_Research->PFOS_Internal_Research[label="<Hansen learns of prior research>"];PFOS_Internal_Research->PFOS_Secret[label="<Company secrecy and compartmentalization>"];PFOS_Research->Bacon[label="<Bacon questions findings>"];Bacon->Hansen[label="<Hansen marginalized and reprimanded>"];PFOS_Research->DeSimone[label="<Hansen presents findings to CEO>"];DeSimone->EPA_Notification[label="<3M notifies EPA but downplays risks>"];EPA_Notification->PFOS_Phaseout[label="<3M decides to phase out PFOS>"];PFOS_Phaseout->PFAS_Settlement[label="<3M settles lawsuit>"];PFOS_Secret->PFAS_Environmental_Impact[label="<Secrets lead to widespread contamination>"];PFAS_Environmental_Impact->Public_Awareness[label="<Continued research and public awareness>"];PFOS_Phaseout->Hansen_Volunteer[label="<Hansen leaves 3M and volunteers>"];PFAS_Settlement->PFAS_Regulation[label="<EPA takes regulatory action>"];}
